data.name: Above Below
data.detailed_description: Above Below is a tree-growing simulator in which you can create your own unique tree. Manage resources to grow bigger and stronger. Strengthen yourself against the elements and threats that are determined to destroy you. Learn what makes a good tree great. From seed to tree the journey is up to you!
data.about_the_game: Above Below is a tree-growing simulator in which you can create your own unique tree. Manage resources to grow bigger and stronger. Strengthen yourself against the elements and threats that are determined to destroy you. Learn what makes a good tree great. From seed to tree the journey is up to you!
data.short_description: Above Below is a tree-growing simulator in which you can create your own unique tree. Manage resources to grow bigger and stronger. Strengthen yourself against the elements and threats that are determined to destroy you. Learn what makes a good tree great. From seed to tree the journey is up to you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
